      • getNextTime

        public long getNextTime(long baseTime,
               boolean useGranularity)
        Description copied from class: RepeatingDate
        Returns the next time this repeating date specifies, after/on baseTime
        Overrides:
        getNextTime in class RepeatingDate
        Parameters:
        baseTime - Base time in milliseconds
        useGranularity - If true, return baseTime if baseTime is within the same granularity as the previously calculated date. If false or if baseTime is before or after the granularity period, calculate the next date after baseTime
